title: Video: Jonny On The Rocks – The Undertow
body:
Splitting his time between LA, Toronto and Brooklyn, Jonathan Nunes- Simone aka **Jonny On The Rocks** has shared his latest creation, the rather eerie _The Undertow_, set to visuals lifted from the Luc Besson film The Big Blue.

One of the most fitting visual accompaniments you’ll witness this year, the track goes from strength to strength, opening slightly shakily, yet gradually building to an overwhelming crescendo of layered vocals, ending with a bang.
